players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out today."
Bob: "That's a lie, Charlie. I investigated Diana last night and she was the mafioso. Why are you framing me?"
You: "Wait, both of you are claiming to be the detective? That's impossible - there's only one detective in this game. One of you is definitely lying."

Bob: "Alice, think about it: if Charlie were the real detective, why would he investigate me on night 1 when Diana was the obvious first kill? He's trying to control the narrative by eliminating me first."
You: "Bob, your logic doesn't add up. You claim you investigated Diana and found she was the mafioso, but if Diana was mafia, why would the mafia kill one of their own? That makes no sense."
Charlie: "Alice is right - Bob's story is impossible. Mafia wouldn't kill their own member. I'm the real detective and Bob is mafia. Vote Bob out now."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
